'''Nicholas Blane''' is a British actor. He has had several recurring roles in British drama series such as ''[[wikipedia:Coronation Street|Coronation Street]]'', ''[[wikipedia:Little Dorrit|Little Dorrit]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:Trial & Retribution|Trial and Retribution]]''. On film he has appeared in ''[[wikipedia:Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix (film)|Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:The Illusionist (2006 film)|The Illusionist]]''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he is playing the role of the [[Spice King]]. He was confirmed in the role on 7 October 2011.<ref>[http://winter-is-coming.net/2011/10/day-75-casting-news-plus-more-set-photos-from-dubrovnik/ Winter is Coming]</ref> He joined the cast as a guest star in the [[Season 2|second season]].
